website_summaries.verdict: Most runners considered the Cortana 4 from Saucony as the definitive version of the series. It is a relatively lightweight neutral shoe that offers responsive cushioning and a comfortable ride. This shoe is best for both the track and the road.
pros: Most runners appreciated the comfort and lightweight that Cortana 4 offers
The low profile design offers more freedom in terms of foot movement
Most runners emphasized the secured fit in the arch and heel of the 4th version
The significant redesigning and sleek appearance of the Saucony Cortana 4 is something most runners appreciate
Runners with slightly wide feet are happy with the shoe because of the roomy toe box
The durability is reliable and precise, even when it comes to the individual parts
cons: Few runners find the shoe irritating because of the heel cup that rubs the foot
Some runners are unsatisfied with the reduced stiffness of the Cortana 4
There were complaints of the forefoot area being a bit tight for the toes

customer_reviews.title: This are the best shoes that I have worn for work
customer_reviews.text: This are the best shoes that I have worn for work. They support the arch of my feet and therefore they are easy on my back. I got to say that to run a marathon not the best ones they did not reduce the impact on my joint specially my knees and hips. I have run in saucony two marathons and this was my third, the shoes are great but I have never felt the pain in my joints with the previous saucony. Over all they are great for work.
customer_reviews.author: anonimous

customer_reviews.title: Great high mileage running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, I went through 2 pairs of Cortana 2 and decided to go back and try the 4s. They are lightweight but reasonably stiff sole makes you feel like you are getting a lot of support with a neutral minimal drop shoe. Felt great on the first run. I would consider these to be a good high mileage shoe, I am going to use them for my current training and October marathon
customer_reviews.author: Aaron I Van Nice

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars for quality, 5 for price
customer_reviews.text: I go back and forth with these shoes. When I first bought them, I loved them instantly. As the month went on, I gradually moved away from them and back to my Kayanos. I have been wearing these again the last two weeks and they are great again. Super light, good cushion, enough stability for those who need it. And at the price I paid, can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: docbad32

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight running shoe for me. I have long, narrow feet with a low arch. I can't comment on arch support since I use custom orthotics with them. The toebox has good room and there's good cushioning for the mid to forefoot. Only negative I have is the outer sole is wearing down a bit quickly.
customer_reviews.author: estrennen

customer_reviews.title: Been in Cortana since the first model
customer_reviews.text: Been running Cortanas since Cortana 1. These are very similar to the 3's. I wear 11 in these shoes where mostly I am 10 1/2 in most other shoes, including other Saucony models. These shoes are plush, but responsive, flexible, but stable, and have best uppers you'll ever try.
customer_reviews.author: MannyB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect. Put a lot of miles on them all ready.
customer_reviews.author: larry scott black

customer_reviews.title: Another Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these running shoes! I hope they last for a long time. He wears a 14 and it is almost impossible to buy this size off the shelf. He does not wear them for running but for overall comfort. They have great arch and heel support which is important to him.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are amazing! By far the most comfortable pair of running ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing! By far the most comfortable pair of running shoes I have ever purchased. I'm a big guy, 6', 220 lbs, who works out 3-4 days weekly which includes jogging on a track, sidewalk, or trail. My feet are supported nicely through the arch, the heel, and snug but comfortable through the toe box. I typically purchase Nikes and Under Armour however these shoes have converted me to a Saucony fan. They are my first pair of Saucony's and not only do they feel amazing, they look really sharp and I have received several compliments about my shoes. They definitely stand out! Oh yeah...........THE PRICE!!! What a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Cruz Crew

customer_reviews.title: Toe box too narrow for me ...
customer_reviews.text: very narrow toe box compared to the Saucony Zealot ISO or even the Saucony Mirage. I thought they might stretch out over time but after 50 miles it does not seem to be happening.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Gribble

customer_reviews.title: Very light but limited support
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are very light but could use more arch support. Seems to be a little smaller than a same size pair of Brooks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable everyday running shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable running shoe. Sufficient support, while also being lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes, 80 miles in and counting, optimal support, satisfied with weight, picture of the shoes attached
customer_reviews.author: Sergei

customer_reviews.title: ... run over 75kms in these shoes and they are fantastic. Excellent support
customer_reviews.text: I've already run over 75kms in these shoes and they are fantastic. Excellent support, fairly lightweight and extremely comfortable. I chose the 4mm drop version and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Aussie Craig

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Saucony shoes are always great. And the Cortana is an excellent shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel F Tomaino

customer_reviews.title: The Cortana 4 works for me. I run 40 ...
customer_reviews.text: The Cortana 4 works for me. I run 40 miles a week and the shoe holds up well (up to 400 miles for me).
customer_reviews.author: Fun to Run

customer_reviews.title: Excellent arch support
customer_reviews.text: These are everything I expected . Excellent arch support. Terry S.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cortana: R.I.P.
customer_reviews.text: Fav shoe for road marathon training & racing. Sadly it is no more after this version, so had to buy what's left.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Will continue to buy. They fit my feet perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My feet usually hurt during and after I walk, but with these shoes, they don't at all.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Davis

customer_reviews.title: Getting use to again.
customer_reviews.text: I have run in trail shoes for so long that it took a bit of getting use to road shoes. But out of the box they were a bit tight. Due to trail shoes having a wider toe box. But after couple of days of running they have stretched out and feel pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Look amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Solid 3 stars for looks! Very narrow. Not for people with toes which is too bad cause the looks of these are bad-$&:!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ScrappyKel

customer_reviews.title: When Saucony Gets it Right
customer_reviews.text: Fair warning, I own 4 pair. But my other Saucony running shoes don't really come close, this is the perfect blend of 4mm drop, true size, neutral stride, lighter weight - plush - asphalt running shoe. Saucony absolutely got it right with this shoe, though I can't say they recreated this success in the newer designs - yuk. As a 4 times a week runner on asphalt, this is the right shoe for me. I don't think you'll be able to buy these 6 months from now, get=um on sale now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost the Same as Cortana 3 with Roomier toe-box
customer_reviews.text: Once again, I just used this shoe out of the Box and got a PR for my 10KM. The shoe feels a more flexible and toe box feels roomier compared to Cortana 3
customer_reviews.author: WYM

product_meta.title: Saucony Cortana 4 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Designed using a revolutionary material Flexfilm offers a lightweight, high strength material which is melded to the upper allowing for fewer layers to be used in the shoes construction. The result is a seamless design that has a flexible feel to work with your natural motions of movement. Ensuring your heel is secure and stable while in motion, moulded support locks the heel into place while SAUC-FIT adds another layer of security. Utilizing midfoot hugging stretch components, the heel and forefoot of the shoe are able to flex and move with the Foot delivering a secure yet more natural feeling fit and ride. The Comfortlite Sockliner ensures a highly responsive feel underfoot, while also providing support to the arch and reduce peak pressure in forefoot. An advanced midsole engineered using POWERGRID absorbs a disperses impact shock and distributes pressure. The unique lightweight ultra premium cushioning foam integrated with GRID technology creates a system that effectively centres the foot and ounce for ounce delivers a smoother more rebound filled ride. SRC delivers durable and consistent shock absorption in the heel crashpad to assist with the reduction of torque and allow for a clean heel strike and transition into the midfoot while running. Ensuring the longevity of the shoes support and cushioning a second density medial post adds that extra support for consistent responsiveness mile after mile A supremely lightweight yet durable outsole rubber enhances the existing attributes of the shoe. Engineered using IBR+ technology, when compared to standard blown rubber the outsole delivers higher cushioning properties at 33% lighter. The traction capabilities are delivered with XT-900 technology, creating an outsole of carbon rubber which provides the shoe with exceptional levels of traction and high wear properties.
feature_bullets: Eye-catching running shoe with breathable mesh upper featuring lace entry and PowerGrid full-length cushioning
